name: node-tdd
description: Node.js Test-Driven Development plugin with TypeScript support, SOLID principles, clean code practices, and functional patterns
author: Claude Code Plugin

commands.name: tdd
commands.description: Execute complete RED-GREEN-REFACTOR TDD cycle for Node.js/TypeScript development

commands.name: red
commands.description: Design comprehensive failing tests for a feature or behavior in the RED phase of TDD

commands.name: green
commands.description: Write minimal code to make failing tests pass in the GREEN phase of TDD

commands.name: refactor
commands.description: Improve code design while maintaining all passing tests in the REFACTOR phase of TDD

commands.name: review
commands.description: Review code for principle compliance and generate structured feedback

agents.name: test-designer
agents.description: Designs failing tests for the RED phase of TDD in Node.js/TypeScript projects

agents.name: implementer
agents.description: Writes minimal code to pass tests during the GREEN phase of TDD

agents.name: refactorer
agents.description: Improves code design during the REFACTOR phase while keeping all tests green

agents.name: reviewer
agents.description: Reviews code for principle compliance and provides structured feedback

skills.name: solid-principles
skills.description: SOLID principles adapted for functional and TypeScript-first development

skills.name: clean-code
skills.description: Clean code principles adapted for TypeScript-first, functional development

skills.name: functional-patterns
